# zendesk_tags (Data Source)

Provides a data source to query tags.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "zendesk_tags" "all" {
}

output "tag_names" {
  value = data.zendesk_tags.all.tags
}

output "tag_count" {
  value = data.zendesk_tags.all.count
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `count` (Number) Total count of tags.
- `id` (String) The ID of this data source.
- `tags` (List of String) List of tag names.
